title: Fontographer Help
content:

Rachel
author: Curiousity

comments.content:
Oh! Got it answered.

FYI: Those lines are part of the "font info" which delineate the em square value of the face. To change them, go to Element\>Font Info

cheers
Can't you just unlock them and drag them around? If not, switch to FontLab. :P
